task.summary: Add log coloring Make message decryption code easier to read
Add log coloring Make message decryption code easier to read Reply now checks if IP address is empty
Ignore tunnel interfaces on Linux Color command output and prompt
Add README.md Add copyright messages Add license (GNU GPL version 3)

Optimizations and bug fixes Add capability for client to request a server update their copy of the client's key Add protocol documentation (see PROTOCOL.md) Add version to UPNP message Fix server throwing exception when PacChat shuts down Update PacChat protocol (incompatible with previous versions) Update README.md
Fix updatelist command Update gradle wrapper
Add capability to track all incoming updates Code optimizations, mainly finalizing and localizing variables
Correct code errors, update dependencies Cleanup code
Add delete contact functionality Fix contact file location Add central contact manager class Sent messages log to message pane, received messages still WIP Few log message tweaks
GUI can now display received messages Blank message box on send
Bugfixes and optimizations Begin P2P development
Create peer manager Begin 'getaddr' implementation Update P2P-PROTOCOL.md

Enable (buggy) P2P functionality in regular usage, same as regular server Begin implementing P2P messaging, there are still bugs to be fixed Prevent adding 127.0.0.1 as a P2P peer When writing peers to disk, ensure peers.txt exists Add 'getkey' and 'p2pconnect' commands Add key fingerprinting Add capability to determine external IP New dependency: Apache HttpClient 4.5.2
Complete P2P messaging Send messages over P2P network if possible
Hotfix 3 for P2P connection handling Further prevent connecting to 127.0.0.1 as a peer
More bugfixes and optimizations Properly disconnect from all peers on shutdown Further prevent invalid peers, prevent adding self as peer Downgrade fingerprint hash algorithm to SHA256
Optimize peer file I/O Update documentation Bugfixes
Add manual P2P connection Print error message if key fingerprint computation fails Prevent enabling P2P if there are no peers connected
Allow P2P clients to accept messages Add debug log level Bugfixes and optimizations

MESSAGE.value: Bugfixes and optimizations Begin P2P development
Create peer manager Begin 'getaddr' implementation Update P2P-PROTOCOL.md

Enable (buggy) P2P functionality in regular usage, same as regular server Begin implementing P2P messaging, there are still bugs to be fixed Prevent adding 127.0.0.1 as a P2P peer When writing peers to disk, ensure peers.txt exists Add 'getkey' and 'p2pconnect' commands Add key fingerprinting Add capability to determine external IP

Enable (buggy) P2P functionality in regular usage, same as regular server Begin implementing P2P messaging, there are still bugs to be fixed Prevent adding 127.0.0.1 as a P2P peer When writing peers to disk, ensure peers.txt exists Add 'getkey' and 'p2pconnect' commands Add key fingerprinting Add capability to determine external IP New dependency: Apache HttpClient 4.5.2
Complete P2P messaging Send messages over P2P network if possible
Hotfix 3 for P2P connection handling Further prevent connecting to 127.0.0.1 as a peer
More bugfixes and optimizations Properly disconnect from all peers on shutdown Further prevent invalid peers Downgrade fingerprint hash algorithm to SHA256
More bugfixes and optimizations Properly disconnect from all peers on shutdown Further prevent invalid peers, prevent adding self as peer Downgrade fingerprint hash algorithm to SHA256
Optimize peer file I/O Update documentation Bugfixes
Add manual P2P connection Print error message if key fingerprint computation fails Prevent enabling P2P if there are no peers connected
Allow P2P clients to accept messages Add debug log level Bugfixes and optimizations
